title: Please Help.
body: Hello everyone .. soo i was playing league of legends with many account's, and the league was updating faster.But now the league update is so slow.. 500 (3400 kbps) and its still 33 %..i guess i can't play league.Please help me! [***Sorry for the bad english***.]

replies.body:
Do you get an error message at all?

If not, try this: when the patcher download speed goes down to 0 kbps, try disconnecting and reconnecting (refreshing) your internet connection. Sometimes just that refresh will get it working again.

Best of luck.
